oai_dc:dc.dc:title: WATER WAVE SCATTERING BY ROWS OF CIRCULAR CYLINDERS
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Dalrymple, Robert A.
Seo, Seung Nam
Martin, Paul A.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: cylinders
rows of cylinders
wave scattering
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: The scattering of waves by a finite number of rows of circular cylinders is examined. Reflection and transmission coefficients are obtained and compared to Kakuno's experimental data. Following Twersky (1962), the scattering from a single row of cylinders (or the single grating problem) is numerically solved. The wide-spacing approximation is used to find the effect of multiple gratings.
oai_dc:dc.dc:source: Coastal Engineering Proceedings; No. 21 (1988): Proceedings of 21st Conference on Coastal Engineering, Torremolinos, Spain, 1988.; 164
